articles.author: Chandelis Duster, CNN
articles.title: 'No reason for Americans to panic': White House seeks to calm fears over coronavirus
articles.description: National security adviser Robert O'Brien on Sunday said at this time "there's no reason for Americans to panic" about the Wuhan coronavirus, saying the threat is "low risk" in the United States.
articles.content:
Washington (CNN)National security adviser Robert O'Brien on Sunday said at this time "there's no reason for Americans to panic" about the Wuhan coronavirus, saying the threat is "low risk" in the United States.

articles.author: Dakin Andone, CNN
articles.title: US travel restrictions go into place Sunday evening to combat coronavirus spread
articles.description: The United States will implement stringent travel restrictions Sunday evening in an effort to contain the novel coronavirus outbreak that has so far killed more than 300 people in China and infected more than 14,000 worldwide.
articles.content:
(CNN)The United States will implement stringent travel restrictions Sunday evening in an effort to contain the novel coronavirus outbreak that has so far killed more than 300 people in China and infected more than 14,000 worldwide.

articles.author: Julia Hollingsworth, CNN
articles.title: First person outside of mainland China dies of Wuhan coronavirus
articles.description: A man in the Philippines has died from the Wuhan coronavirus -- the first time a death has been reported outside mainland China since the outbreak began in December.

articles.author: Evan Perez and Faith Karimi, CNN
articles.title: As coronavirus spreads, TSA issues new directive for anyone entering the US from China
articles.description: The Transportation Security Administration (TSA) issued a new directive effective Sunday requiring airlines to ask passengers on flights from outside the United States if they've been to mainland China in the past 14 days.
articles.content:

articles.title: Over 300 dead from coronavirus as outbreak infects more than 14,300

articles.author: Nectar Gan, CNN
articles.title: The people of Wuhan have become outcasts in their own country amid epidemic
articles.description: In China, Wuhan used to be known as a city of cherry blossoms, an economic engine of the central heartland, and the birthplace of a century-old revolution that brought down the country's last imperial dynasty.
articles.content:
